meanings.definition: The process of editing or preparing a document for publication.
meanings.sent1: The redaction of the article took hours to ensure it was error-free.
meanings.sent2: The redaction of the book involved checking for spelling mistakes and formatting issues.
meanings.sent3: After the redaction, the document looked polished and ready for printing.
meanings.sent4: Her redaction of the report transformed it into a professional piece of work.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous redaction made the final version of the document look impeccable.

meanings.definition: The act of revising or censoring a document for confidentiality or clarity.
meanings.sent1: The redaction of the sensitive information was necessary to protect privacy.
meanings.sent2: The redaction of the email removed any personal details before sending it out.
meanings.sent3: During the redaction, the document felt like a secret puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: The redaction of the classified document was like painting over hidden messages.
meanings.sent5: The careful redaction ensured that only the essential information remained visible.
